lines.text: I'm smart too. I got three-seventy and five-forty on the Master-Blaster.

[Awestruck]
Jeez.
Wait. Master-Blaster? What is that?
Its a video game, Tony!
Yeah, I should've known you'd know!
It would seem that the men of Texas are not just content to lose money in the oil business.
Yin, I want the million, and I want it now in cash.

[to his men]
Kill them! Kill them all!
Hey Tony, he's not such a bad sort.
Would you shut the shit up! A lot you know.
I see you've met Chao Tung. This is Pang.
Yeah, yeah - ping, pong, pang.
What do you wanna drink?
You should do something about your face bro. Get me some tequila.
Look what this karate-guy is doing to Chang!
Well if it isn't one of Yin's slimeballs Tiger Joe.
Well at least you got the name right.

[Billy enters the cage, and extends his hand]
Hello, my name is Billy.
FUCK YOU!
[kicks him]
